de.myreality.dev.chronos.scripting
Interface Scriptable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationRenderComponent, Component, Entity, ImageRenderComponent, SlickComponent, SlickEntity, SlickRenderComponent
public interface Scriptable

This file is part of Chronos (Myreality Game Development Toolkit). Chronos is licenced under GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE (Version 3)

For more information visit http://dev.my-reality.de/chronos

Is used by the script builder in order to create scripts of a specific class implementation. Additionally this interface provides scripting support of any scripting language.

Since:
0.5
Author:
Miguel Gonzalez

Method Summary
 void appendScript(Script script)
          Appends a new script to the current implementation.
 void generateScript(ScriptBuilder builder)
          Is directly called by the script builder in order to make a new script for the class.
 Script getScript(java.lang.String path)
          Returns a script with the given path (if exists)
 java.util.Collection<Script> getScripts()
           
 

Method Detail

generateScript

void generateScript(ScriptBuilder builder)
Is directly called by the script builder in order to make a new script for the class.

Parameters:
builder - ScriptBuilder instance

appendScript

void appendScript(Script script)
Appends a new script to the current implementation.

Parameters:
script - Script to append

getScripts

java.util.Collection<Script> getScripts()
Returns:
A collection of all contained scripts

getScript

Script getScript(java.lang.String path)
                 throws ScriptNotFoundException
Returns a script with the given path (if exists)

Parameters:
path - Path ID of the script
Returns:
Script instance (on success), otherwise an exception is thrown
Throws:
Is - thrown if the script does not exist
ScriptNotFoundException
